ygData.subject: Re: angry
ygData.msgSnippet: He realized Mustex didn t come out of either pod and must have been online for sometime. One of the protoforms must have gone offline. Then he saw the Maximal

 He realized Mustex didn't come out of either pod and must have been 
online for sometime. One of the protoforms must have gone offline. 
Then he saw the Maximal insignia on Mustex and knew he had lost the 
protoform. Worse yet the new bot looked like a BABY, it had to be 
weak now, but it could be a formidable opponent in the future if it 
went through the same gradual upgrades as humans. He wouldn't allow 
it to happen. HE was the maost powerful bot in the universe, and it 
would stay that way. He transformed to dragon mode and spit fire at 
the 2 bots...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> OOCHeres a start to the time travel thing, I got him back and set 
up the
> conflict, now you can control him for the battle then I'll bring 
him back to
> the future to continue the story.
> 
> BIC Megaton flew across the Atlantic much like the Pilgrims will 
one day do.
> He lands on the shore and devises a plan to delete his Predacessor 
Megatron.
> Two units with the tyrants personality were two to many but 
according to the
> mutants math there was only one to destroy. transforming to his 
freakish
> robot mode from his dragon form cut his size by four. he scanned 
the area
> and found a hidden cave nearby. He needed rest and the cave would 
offer
> enough concealment.
> 
> Once inside the mutant found the cave paintings from a youth,  from 
what he
> could tell the youth was human, a tribe of the useless fleshy, weak
> creatures must have migrated away and left only thier paintings to 
show they
> were ever there.
> 
> Megaton reached out and touched the wall, a sudden charge of energy 
forced
> the large bot away from the wall. He held up his hand and scanned 
it for an
> energy signature only to find nothing had happened to him. The 
scanns did
> reveal one oddity though. A thin layer of berries, sap, and mud had 
coated
> his fingers. The wall paintings were wet like they were drawn an 
hour ago
> instead of  years past.
> 
> The mutant exited the cave ansd scanned the world. two pods weren't 
far
> away. The beast transformed to his T-Rex form and went to 
investigate. once
> nearby he detected animals, three of them. from the looks of things 
there
> was a mother, father and baby. A mighty swing of the monsters tail 
remedied
> the family situation killing the mother (leaving the baby and 
fathers DNA to
> be replicated.) After the two creatures ran away he continued to 
the pod
> where he saw Stallex and Mustex, they weren't bots he recognized.
> 
> BOOC He's all yours dewboy, try to return him in the same condition 
that you
> borrowed him in.
> ----- Original Message -----

> To: <nbwrpg@y...>

time

from

mutant
> > > virus which
> > > > removes most signs of a robot form) I'm sure something can be

> > > > maybe have Stallex attacked by a bot resembling Megaton. A

temporal

> > > > will send Megaton back in time to when Stallex was young but 
it
> > > hasn't

temporal
> > > physics
> > > > please explain them to me, I'm getting a headache just 
thinking
> > > about it.)
